title: A Look At US Vice President Kamala Harris' View On Key Business Topics
content: U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris is potentially poised to become the Democratic presidential nominee in the November election. Here are her views and actions related to some key business topics.

title: Biden's Exit From US Election Offers Opportunities, Pitfalls For Democrats
content: Joe Biden's withdrawal from the US election offers Democrats the precious opportunity for a late reset in a campaign that was going badly -- but ushers in an uncertain few weeks that will make or break their chances against Donald Trump.
summary: Joe Biden's withdrawal from the US election offers Democrats the precious opportunity for a late reset in a campaign that was going badly -- but ushers in an uncertain few weeks that will make or break their chances against Donald Trump.

title: All Democratic Party US State Chairs Back Harris To Be Presidential Nominee
content: All 50 Democratic party state chairs have thrown their weight behind Vice President Kamala Harris to be the party's new presidential nominee, according to sources familiar with the matter.

title: Houthis Vow "Huge" Retaliation Against Israel For Deadly Port Strike
content: Yemen's Houthi rebels on Sunday promised a "huge" retaliation against Israel for a deadly strike on the port of Hodeida, as regional fallout widens from months of war in Gaza.

title: How US Reacted To President Joe Biden's Decision To Not Seek Re-Election
content: U.S. President Joe Biden on Sunday ended his reelection campaign. He said in a letter posted on social media platform X that he would remain in office until the end of his term and address the country later this week on his decision.

title: Anatomy Of A Fall: Joe Biden Passes The Torch
content: Four years ago, as he ran for the White House, Joe Biden saw himself as a one-term president -- a savvy conduit from the chaotic years of Donald Trump to a new generation of Democratic leaders.

title: With Harris, Democrats Would Bet Against US History Of Sexism, Racism
content: The Democratic party will be taking a historic gamble if it now turns to Vice President Kamala Harris to become its presidential candidate, betting that a Black woman can overcome racism, sexism and her own missteps as a politician to defeat Republic

title: What Barack Obama Said On Biden's Decision To Drop Out Of White House Race
content: Barack Obama praised US President Joe Biden's decision to drop out of the White House race on Sunday, saying it was testament to the US leader's "love of country" -- but warned of "uncharted waters" ahead of the November 5 election.

title: Clintons Praise Biden's "Extraordinary Career Of Service", Endorse Harris
